output.map_title: Map to show the number of graduates of all subjects now working in Education who studied in each region five years after graduation, male and female first degree graduates from English HE providers, 2020/21 tax year.
output.maptext: For first degree graduates of all subjects in the Education industry five years after graduation, the region where the most graduates had studied was South East. The region where the fewest graduates had studied was North East. The region where the highest number of graduates lived five years after graduation was London and the region where the fewest graduates lived was North East.
output.maptext2: For first degree graduates of all subjects in the Education industry, the region with the highest proportionate increase in graduates who studied compared to living in the region five years after graduation was East of England, where the number of graduates increased by 67.3%. The region with the largest decrease was South East where the number of graduates decreased by -25.5%.
